user_query: journey that left only a mere few years on his own life he still doesn't win he returns home as his daughter is on her deathbed and they share just a few moments with each other Murph tells her father that no parent should ever have to watch their child die tells him to leave as she has her children there for her Cooper loses everything of course Cooper still gets to live the rest of his years and he still succeeded in the mission but the real mission was always going to end in Cooper giving the ultimate sacrifice my brother said that Interstellar was too long which made it unenjoyable which is fair Interstellar is a very long and kind of slow movie but it's the same as reading a long book series you need to invest time into it and if you choose to you get connected to the characters you get involved in the story and the story becomes a part of you which is why I love Interstellar every time I watch it I notice something different I still get emotional I still get excited and I'm always Blown Away by the beautiful ending and shows us just how far a father would go for his children it's deeper love that anyone could ever imagine a love that is perfectly encapsulated in Joseph Cooper as he trades the time he would have had with his children for his children to get that time with theirs Interstellar is long but a message this complex shouldn't be crapped out in an hour and a half and advertises an action movie because Interstellar isn't the greatest action movie of all time in

entities.entity_description: Interstellar는 아버지가 자녀를 위해 얼마나 멀리 갈 수 있는지를 보여주는 긴 영화로, 복잡한 메시지와 아름다운 결말을 가진 작품이다
Cooper는 Interstellar의 주인공으로, 자녀들을 위해 궁극적인 희생을 하며 임무를 수행하는 아버지이다. 자신의 인생에서 몇 년밖에 남지 않은 상태로 돌아와 임종 직전의 딸과 마지막 순간을 함께한다
Murph는 Cooper의 딸로, 임종 직전에 아버지와 재회하며 어떤 부모도 자식이 죽는 것을 봐서는 안 된다고 말하고, 자신의 자녀들이 곁에 있으니 떠나라고 아버지에게 말한다
Joseph Cooper는 자녀들이 그들의 자녀와 함께할 시간을 위해 자신이 자녀들과 함께할 시간을 희생하는 인물로, 상상할 수 없는 깊은 사랑을 완벽하게 구현한 캐릭터이다

relationships.relationship_description: Cooper는 Murph의 아버지이며, 영화에서 둘은 임종 직전에 재회한다
Joseph Cooper와 Cooper는 동일한 캐릭터로, Joseph Cooper는 Cooper의 풀네임이다
Joseph Cooper는 Interstellar에서 아버지의 사랑을 완벽하게 구현한 캐릭터이다
